r.s: libenchant binder, support near all spelling tools
r.d: Enchant is a binder for libenchant. Libenchant provides a common API for many spell libraries: - aspell/pspell (intended to replace ispell) - hspell (hebrew) - ispell - myspell/hunspell (OpenOffice project, mozilla) - uspell (primarily Yiddish, Hebrew, and Eastern European languages) A plugin system allows to add custom spell support. see www.abisource.com/enchant/
r.n: - add enchant_broker_set_dict_path and enchant_broker_get_dict_path. Allows custom locations for the ispell and myspell dictionnaries - add ENCHANT_ISPELL and ENCHANT_MYSPELL constants
